item.title: Hamming Number
item.description: Problem Source: Codewars A Hamming number is a positive integer of the form 2i3j5k, for some non-negative integers i, j, and k. Write a function that computes the nth smallest Hamming number. Specifically: The first smallest Hamming number is 1 = 203050 The second smallest Hamming number is 2 = 213050 The third smallest Hamming number is 3 = 203150 The fourth smallest Hamming number is 4 = 223050 The fifth smallest Hamming number is 5 = 203051 The 20 smallest Hamming numbers are given in example test fixture.
